Text:
the perfect example of 100% stupid info.

some admin should delete all torrents not containing:
1. a proper title
2. understandable info in english.
3. virus (of course)
4. spam
How about lousy, useless (and non relevant) comments on peoples uploaded torrents? I think they should be banned to in that case.

2. understandable info in english.

Yeah, cos anyone who's first language isn't english has no business being on the net, right?............lol
